sentences.english: The tube can be provided in coils or cut to length.

sentences.english: Can use the brush and vacuum cleaners, washing the dust on the coil.

sentences.english: The heating and cooling symbols on the display show the status of the fan coil.
sentences.chinese: 加热和冷却符号在屏幕上显示的风机盘管的地位。

sentences.english: Heating coils are used to heat flasks and other containers.
sentences.chinese: 加热盘管可以用于加热烧瓶及其它容器。

sentences.english: When the coil temperature rose to 9 degrees or so the end of the cream immediately.
sentences.chinese: 当盘管温度回升至9度左右除霜立即结束。

sentences.english: The heating element is integrated with a helically coiled tube and cast-in aluminum for maximum efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 加热部件有螺旋盘管和镶铸铝，提供了最大的高效性。

sentences.english: The hair pin and U-type brass pipe brazing.
sentences.chinese: 冷冻空调散热盘管与U型管焊接制作。

sentences.english: What are the types of stainless steel coil?
sentences.chinese: 不锈钢盘管有哪些种类？

sentences.english: It may be helpful to the development of this kind of air conditioners.
sentences.chinese: 对风机盘管空调器的开发具有参考意义。

sentences.english: Indicates the feasibility to reduce the outlet air temperature for dry coils.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了降低干盘管出风温度的方法及其可行性。

sentences.english: The heating coil melts the hydrates and partially stabilizes the hydrocarbon liquids.
sentences.chinese: 加热盘管融化水合物并使烃液部分稳定。

sentences.english: Two types of direct expansion coil are used .
